verbs.description: The danger of a [V: failed] [ARG1: summit] is that Trump ’s “ war cabinet ” would use a failure to goad Trump into confrontation .
[ARG1: The danger of a failed summit] [V: is] [ARG2: that Trump ’s “ war cabinet ” would use a failure to goad Trump into confrontation] .
The danger of a failed summit is that Trump ’s “ war cabinet ” [V: would] use a failure to goad Trump into confrontation .
The danger of a failed summit is that [ARG0: Trump ’s “ war cabinet ”] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: use] [ARG1: a failure] [ARG2: to goad Trump into confrontation] .
The danger of a failed summit is that [ARG0: Trump ’s “ war cabinet ”] would use a failure to [V: goad] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: into confrontation] .
